mapper.select: select region_sido, sum(region_slightly) as region_slightly, sum(region_injured) as region_injured, sum(region_death) as region_death, sum(region_seriously) as region_seriously from accident_regional group by region_sido;

select start_hour, traffic_volume, conzoneName from real_traffic where start_hour like #{time} and
date_format(stdDate , "%Y-%m-%d") <= str_to_date(#{date},"%Y-%m-%d") and date_format(stdDate , "%Y-%m-%d") > date_sub(str_to_date(#{date},"%Y-%m-%d"), interval 5 day)
group by conzoneName order by start_hour desc
select #{name}, conzoneName from real_traffic group by conzoneName
select distinct routeName like #{name} and conzoneName like #{specificname} from real_traffic
select * from accident_section where date_format(startDate , "%Y-%m-%d") >= str_to_date(#{date}, "%Y-%m-%d")
